item.title: Cooper Hoffman Hits His Stride: ‘The Long Walk’ Star on the Thriller’s ‘Exhausting’ Shoot, Confronting Acting Doubts and Coming of Age After ‘Licorice Pizza’
item.description: “You got your license, and you got handed the keys to a Lamborghini.’” That’s what a friend’s father told Cooper Hoffman when he was cast in 2021’s “Licorice Pizza.” And the joy ride lived up to it. I
